mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hall, Ephraim B.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 186[1]. By Telegraph from Fairmont 186[1]. Can & will you give Mrs. Drinkard a letter upon which she can at Washington DC secure a passage to Richmond - If answered yes - She will see you on her way tomorrow E.P. Hall [Ephraim B. Hall] 32W101pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hall, Ephraim B.
Fairmont, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
